plot: Through the unintentional and accidental mix-up of an elopement, two scalliwags get caught robbing a house and two lovers get a fine start on their honeymoon.
title: The Lucky Elopement
plot_es: Through the unintentional and accidental mix-up of an elopement, two scalliwags get caught robbing a house and two lovers get a fine start on their honeymoon.
plot_en: Through the unintentional and accidental mix-up of an elopement, two scalliwags get caught robbing a house and two lovers get a fine start on their honeymoon.
